panel.text:
Select a Nuxeo SDK for using in your Nuxeo projects. If not SDKs are available, then click on 'Download' button to download the SDK of your choice and then install it into Eclipse by using the 'Add' button. Note that the selected SDK becomes the default SDK in your current Eclipse Workspace.
A Nuxeo SDK is intended to manage the classpath of your Nuxeo Plugin projects and to be able to start a Nuxeo server from Eclipse and in order to test your plugins.

panel.checkbox: Do not use SDK classpath container (for experts only)
